title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 816.6 - General application, review and approval procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 816.6 - General application, review and approval procedures

State Regulations
(a) The Secretary shall develop: (1)
an application for municipalities seeking
to receive awards; and
(2)
a
process by which the applications will be evaluated. (b) Such application shall require
municipalities to demonstrate how the action upon which the application is
based has resulted in quantifiable recurring savings, efficiencies, and
permanent improvements to municipal services. (c) Applications shall be considered only for
actions that commenced on or after January 1, 2010. (d) Actions on the basis of which
municipalities apply must already have been implemented at the time of
application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
816.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
